label: OversightForum
name: Oversight Forum
composition: Chairpersons of EBA, ESMA, and EIOPA
primary_tasks: Coordinate cross-sectoral oversight and prepare joint positions

label: OversightForum
name: National Authority Reps
composition: Designated staff from National Competent Authorities
primary_tasks: Provide sector-specific expertise for critical provider assessment

label: OversightForum
name: ECB Representative
composition: Staff from the European Central Bank

label: OversightForum
name: ESRB Representative
composition: Staff from the European Systemic Risk Board

label: OversightForum
name: Lead Overseer Coordinator
composition: The ESA leading a specific oversight mission
primary_tasks: Directing findings of the Oversight Forum to specific providers
